pages.name: Hint #7
pages.text: Strange stones breathe where shadows creep, hidden things inside them sleep. Break the quiet, and claim your prize. A talisman that stills surprise.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #7
pages.text: Obtain a Dastardly Talisman by defeating a Kreeble. These creatures hide in stone similar to silverfish.

pages.name: Answer #7
pages.text: This is what a kreeble looks like. They can jump out of kreeblestone or kreebleslate when broken.$(br)
